FuncDef:
The ip route-static frr command enables Fast ReRoute (FRR) for a static route.
The undo ip route-static frr command disables FRR for a static route. The ip route-static frr command enables Fast ReRoute (FRR) for a static route. The undo ip route-static frr command disables FRR for a static route. By default, FRR is disabled for an IPv4 static route.
